## ðŸ”” Loki Error Logs to Slack (Deduplicated)

This workflow monitors Kubernetes logs via Loki and sends only **unique** errors to Slack every 5 minutes.

### What It Does:
- Queries Loki logs for error patterns
- Filters & parses relevant logs
- Removes duplicate alerts
- Sends clean Slack messages

### ðŸ•’ Trigger

Runs every 5 minutes.
You can adjust this interval as needed.

### ðŸ“¥ Loki Log Query

Sends an HTTP request to Loki with:
- Time range: last 10 minutes
- Regex match: error, failed, timeout, oom, etc.
- Namespaces can be customized

Edit the regex to customize which logs you want.

### ðŸ§¹ Log Parsing

Parses log entries from Loki response.
Extracts:
- Pod
- Namespace
- Container
- Node
- Timestamp
- Log content

Skips null/empty logs automatically.

### ðŸ§  Deduplication

This removes repeated alerts (same log content) in the current batch.
Useful to avoid Slack spam during repeated errors.

### ðŸ“¤ Slack Notification
